Description: Pratesi Italian Leather Alberti Bruce - Womens Leather Bag, Bruce Ciliegia The Pratesi Alberti Bruce - Womens Leather Bag is a high-class polished leather day bag that features 3 internal sections, the central zip section, plus a large zippered pocket, two pen holders, a cell phone holder and 1 small open pocket. It closes with automatic clip that has a hold that is guaranteed. Dust bag included. This womens leather handbag comes in many colors to suit whatever style neccesary. Product Information Material Calf Leather Width 32 cm /12.6 in Height 20 cm/ 7.9 in Depth 10 cm /1.6 in Handles/Strap Leather Hardware Full Brass metal Closure Automatic clip Color Mustard Weight 0.9 kg / 2 lbs Shipping Usually ships in 24 hours Status In stock Handmade in the Florence region of Italy. Tanned in a special technique that uses only natural ingredients, the item develops a beautiful patina as the leather matures over time. Every Pratesi piece is a finely crafted work of leather artisanship. Beautiful Brass & Stainless Steel Hardware with Superior Stitching and Lining finish. Comes with signature Pratesi dust bag to protect your piece. Dimensions: 12.6" (L) x 7.9" (H) x 1.6" (W). Weight: 2 lbs Triple Compartment. Detachable Shoulder Strap Product may ship directly from manufacturer in Italy. Shipping is typically 3-6 days time frame.
